allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: US Stock Analytics Dashboard

Features:
- Multi-tab dashboard \(Analysis, Overview, Technical, Fundamentals, News, Risk\)
- Real-time stock data via yfinance
- News feed integration with Finnhub API
- Sentiment analysis for news headlines
- Sector market share pie chart visualization
- Technical indicators \(RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, Moving Averages\)
- Risk assessment scoring

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR="sed -i 's/^pick dea01cd/reword dea01cd/; s/^pick 6f18d62/reword 6f18d62/'" git rebase:*)
